Content: This picture was taken in July 1964. Pretty sure it is a Yamaha YG1 but can’t tell if it a ‘63 or ’64. The autolube feature would be a tie breaker but is not visible due to riders (my Mom and Dad). Looks to be blue if that helps. Thanks in advance!
